snippet: Mayor Michael Bloomberg’s revised proposal for the next city budget slashes vital programs for needy children. That is no way to balance a budget.
abstract: Editorial condemns New York City Mayor Michael R Bloomberg's revised budget proposal, arguing that slashing vital programs for needy children to spare teachers, police officers and firefighters, is no way to balance a budget.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Michael Bloomberg’s revised proposal for the next city budget slashes vital programs for needy children. That is no way to balance a budget.
